translation.en: He told his friend that he didn't want the book right now.
Knowing they would both be needed, they went together.
translation.tam: Darmok. Darmok at Tanagra. Darmok and Jilad at Tanagra.

translation.en: They made the book available for anyone who wanted it.
She didn't know, but should have.
The pipe burst, causing a flood.
With their old plans in ruin, it was time to try their next idea.
She knew nothing she could do would make it better.
The manufacturing line was interrupted.
The temptation caused him to move closer.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army at Lashmir. With fist open.

translation.en: The child hid something so their friend wouldn't find it.
They rushed him.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army. With fist closed.

translation.en: His arm had been broken.
translation.tam: Zinda! His face black. His eyes red.

translation.en: She would keep going until it worked, no matter what.
translation.tam: Zima at Anzo. Zima and Bakor.

translation.en: The child figured it out.
Everything known was indisputable.
translation.tam: Chenza at court. The court of silence.

translation.en: The ambasador worked hard to broker a deal between everyone involved.
The beast was their enemy.
No matter how hard they tried, he just couldn't seem to get the picture.
The council asked for her report.
He cheered up after their talk.
